link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd

generic:link.msg:message: Identity "Value of Total-Investment in Guaranteed/ Non-Guaranteed Bonds"=(Investment in Guaranteed/ Non-Guaranteed Bonds of NHB+Investment in Guaranteed/ Non-Guaranteed Bonds of HUDCO+Investment in Guaranteed/ Non-Guaranteed Bonds of MBS) do not tally
Identity "Value of Grand Total"=(Amount of Direct Housing Finance+Amount of Indirect Housing Finance+Total Investment in Guaranteed/ Non-Guaranteed Bonds) do not tally
Identity "Value of Total Loan Sales and Securitization"= (Loan Sales+Loans Securitized +All Others) do not tally
Identity "Value of Total Non-SLR Investments (External Rating)"= (External Rating Typed Dimension + Unrated Non-SLR Investments) do not tally
Identity "Value of Total Non-SLR Investments (Internal Rating)"= (Internal Rating Typed Dimension + Unrated Non-SLR Investments) do not tally
"Total Non-SLR Investments (External )" should be equal to "Total Non-SLR Investments (Internal Ratings)"
Amount of "Unrated Non-SLR Investments (Internal Rating) of which exempted for unrated ceiling" should be less than or equal to "Unrated Non-SLR Investments (Internal Rating)"
Amount of "Unrated Non-SLR Investments (External Rating) of which exempted for unrated ceiling" should be less than or equal to "Unrated Non-SLR Investments (External Rating)"
Identity "Value of Loan Sales"= ( Loan Sales to ARCs+Loan Sales to Others) do not tally
Identity "Value of Loans Securitized"= ( Loans Securitized with ARCs+ Loans Securitized with Others) do not tally
Identity "Value of Total- Domestic Operations" = (Domestic cards + International Cards) do not tally
Identity "Value of Global Operations" = (Domestic Operations+ Overseas Operations) do not tally
Identity "Value of Total asset classification"= (Standard + Substandard + Doubtful + Loss) do not tally
Identity "Value of Standard Advances- Summary" = (Standard-Classification of Gross Amount Outstanding as per Asset Classification Norms) do not tally
Identity "Value of Gross NPAs- Summary" = (Substandard + Doubtful + Loss, of Classification of Gross Amount Outstanding as per Asset Classification Norms) do not tally
Identity "Value of Total Advance Outstanding-Summary" =(Total-Classification of Gross Amount Outstanding as per Asset Classification Norms) do not tally

1. Identity "Value of Amount Written Off- Summary" =(Total -Amount Written Offs (during April to Date)) do not tally 2. Identity "Value of NPAs Recovered-Summary"=(Total-Amount of NPAs Recovered (during April to Date)) do not tally
"Minimum Applicable Rate of Interest (ROI)" should be less than or equal to "Maximum Applicable Rate of Interest (ROI)"

Identity "Value of Total Standard Advances for Amt of Advances"=(Amt of Advances with a) Internal Rating+ b)Unrated Advances (Advances where Rating was required)+ c) Advances where Rating is not required) do not tally
"Minimum ROI (Type of the Facility wise) for Total Standard Advances" should be equal to "Minimum value of particular Type of the Facility"
"Maximum ROI (Type of the Facility wise) of Total Standard Advances" should be equal to "Maximum value of particular Type of the Facility"
Identity "Value of Weighted Avg ROI"= ((Amt of Advances*Weighted Avg ROI)/Total Advances(Type of the Facility)) do not tally

Identity "Value of Total Standard Advances for Number of Accounts" =(Number of Accounts with a) Internal Rating+ b)Unrated Advances (Advances where Rating was required)+ c) Advances where Rating is not required) do not tally

variable:precondition.test: ($V2 instance of node() and exists($V2/@contextRef) ) or ($V3 instance of node() and exists($V3/@contextRef) ) or ($V4 instance of node() and exists($V4/@contextRef) )

generic:link.msg:message: Identity "Value of Total asset classification"= (Substandard + Doubtful + Loss) do not tally
